description: Main activity for an Android TV application that sets up the UI with greeting texts, handles focus for remote control, and processes key events like D-pad navigation and back button. It uses FragmentActivity for compatibility with Android TV's Leanback interface.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for an Android TV app, handles UI setup and remote control input.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, binds UI elements, and requests focus.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events like D-pad actions, Enter, and Back button presses.
